data.lyric:
[ti:Drip Too Hard (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Baby/Gunna]
[al:Drip Too Hard (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Drip Too Hard (Explicit) - Lil Baby/Gunna
[00:06.83]Run that back Turbo
[00:08.38]You can get the biggest Chanel bag in the store if you want it
[00:10.81]I gave 'em the drip they sucked it up I got 'em moanin'
[00:12.94]I bought a new Patek I had the watch so I two-toned 'em
[00:15.18]Takin' these drugs I'm gon' be up until the morning
[00:17.29]That ain't your car you just a leaser you don't own it
[00:19.42]If I'm in the club I got that fire when I'm performin'
[00:21.47]The backend just came in in all hundreds
[00:23.88]Fives galore cute s**t they all on us
[00:26.12]I'm from Atlanta where young n***as run s**t
[00:28.06]I know they hatin' on me but I don't read comments
[00:30.11]Whenever I tell her to come she comin'
[00:32.23]Whenever it's smoke we ain't runnin'
[00:35.02]Drip too hard don't stand too close
[00:36.96]You gon' f**k around and drown off this wave
[00:39.11]Doing all these shows I've been on the road
[00:41.16]Don't care where I go long as I get paid
[00:43.47]Bad lil' vibe she been on my mind
[00:45.68]Soon as I get back she gettin' slayed
[00:47.71]Do this all the time this ain't no surprise
[00:49.94]Every other night another movie gettin' made
[00:52.17]Drip too hard don't stand too close
[00:53.91]You gon' f**k around and drown off this wave
[00:56.33]Doing all these shows I've been on the road
[00:58.29]Don't care where I go long as I get paid
[01:00.52]Bad lil' vibe she been on my mind
[01:02.67]Soon as I get back she gettin' slayed
[01:04.88]Do this all the time this ain't no surprise yeah
[01:07.00]Every other night another movie gettin' made
[01:09.12]Every other night another dollar gettin' made
[01:11.33]Every other night started with a good day
[01:13.37]I feel like a child I got boogers in the face
[01:15.26]Diamonds dancin' in the dark like this s**t is a parade
[01:17.72]I don't want your chain I'm gon' want another slave
[01:19.72]I had to draw the line too many b***hes gettin' saved
[01:21.93]TSA harass me so I took a private plane
[01:24.08]These p***y n***as lackin' why I'm workin' on my aim
[01:26.15]Drip too hard charge it to the card
[01:28.12]Designer to the ground I can barely spell the names
[01:30.59]Drip too hard caution on the floor
[01:32.33]You gon' f**k around and drown tryna ride a n***a wave
[01:34.80]Drip too hard don't stand too close
[01:36.47]You gon' f**k around and drown off this wave
[01:38.94]Doing all these shows I've been on the road
[01:40.99]Don't care where I go long as I get paid
[01:43.16]Bad lil' vibe she been on my mind
[01:45.36]Soon as I get back she gettin' slayed
[01:47.50]Do this all the time this ain't no surprise
[01:49.68]Every other night another movie gettin' made
[01:51.85]Drip too hard don't stand too close
[01:53.60]You gon' f**k around and drown off this wave
[01:56.05]Doing all these shows I've been on the road
[01:58.00]Don't care where I go long as I get paid
[02:00.35]Bad lil' vibe she been on my mind
[02:02.45]Soon as I get back she gettin' slayed
[02:04.59]Do this all the time this ain't no surprise
[02:06.75]Every other night another movie gettin' made
data.trans:
[ti:Drip Too Hard (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Baby/Gunna]
[al:Drip Too Hard (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.83]Turbo制作 不同凡响
[00:08.38]想要的话 我可以给你买最贵的香奈儿包包
[00:10.81]和那些女人亲热时 我让她们无比幸福
[00:12.94]我买了块新的百达翡丽 我已经有一块了 所以我就稍微定制了一下
[00:15.18]抽两口这玩意儿 我就能嗨到早上去
[00:17.29]那不是你的车 你不过是个租客 没有所有权
[00:19.42]如果我在俱乐部 只要我开始表演 现场肯定热火朝天
[00:21.47]干副业赚的钱到账了 全是百元大钞
[00:23.88]好多呀 钞票真可爱 全部身上带
[00:26.12]我来自亚特兰大 很多年轻的兄弟都来自这里
[00:28.06]我知道他们恨我 但我对他们的评论视而不见
[00:30.11]我的女人 随叫随到
[00:32.23]要是有人宣战 我绝对不会退缩
[00:35.02]我们太潮了 不要离我们太近了
[00:36.96]否则你会被这无情的浪潮吞没的
[00:39.11]演出一场接一场 忙忙碌碌不停歇
[00:41.16]去哪儿无所谓 有钱赚就行
[00:43.47]不好了 我好像有点想她
[00:45.68]等我回到家 一定要让她尝尝我的厉害
[00:47.71]这种事情是家常便饭 没啥好惊讶的
[00:49.94]每天晚上都是一部激情大片
[00:52.17]我们太潮了 不要离我们太近了
[00:53.91]否则你会被这无情的浪潮吞没的
[00:56.33]演出一场接一场 忙忙碌碌不停歇
[00:58.29]去哪儿无所谓 有钱赚就行
[01:00.52]不好了 我好像有点想她
[01:02.67]等我回到家 一定要让她尝尝我的厉害
[01:04.88]这种事情是家常便饭 没啥好惊讶的 yeah
[01:07.00]每天晚上都是一部激情大片
[01:09.12]每天晚上都有钞票进账
[01:11.33]完美的一天创造美丽的夜晚
[01:13.37]我就像个小孩 总有不怀好意的人在我面前晃
[01:15.26]钻石在黑暗中闪耀舞蹈 就像排队游行
[01:17.72]我不想要你的链子 我又不是奴隶
[01:19.72]我不得不划清界限 不然那些不识好歹的人就完蛋了
[01:21.93]机场安检让我烦死了 所以我只好坐私人飞机了
[01:24.08]这些没种的家伙买不起 我为了自己的目标不懈努力
[01:26.15]我太潮太富太酷炫 有钱就要随便花
[01:28.12]设计师品牌太多了 我都不知道怎么念他们的名字
[01:30.59]我太潮太富太酷炫 小心地滑别摔跤
[01:32.33]想要抄袭我们的风格 小心偷鸡不成蚀把米
[01:34.80]我们太潮了 不要离我们太近了
[01:36.47]否则你会被这无情的浪潮吞没的
[01:38.94]演出一场接一场 忙忙碌碌不停歇
[01:40.99]去哪儿无所谓 有钱赚就行
[01:43.16]不好了 我好像有点想她
[01:45.36]等我回到家 一定要让她尝尝我的厉害
[01:47.50]这种事情是家常便饭 没啥好惊讶的
[01:49.68]每天晚上都是一部激情大片
[01:51.85]我们太潮了 不要离我们太近了
[01:53.60]否则你会被这无情的浪潮吞没的
[01:56.05]演出一场接一场 忙忙碌碌不停歇
[01:58.00]去哪儿无所谓 有钱赚就行
[02:00.35]不好了 我好像有点想她
[02:02.45]等我回到家 一定要让她尝尝我的厉害
[02:04.59]这种事情是家常便饭 没啥好惊讶的
[02:06.75]每天晚上都是一部激情大片
